projects.title: Lumiere
projects.bodyText:
- Development of a game engine as part of the Develop at Ubisoft program. 
- Development in 6 months, from January to May, while mentored by a Ubisoft Ivory Tower developer
- Emphasis on improving my project management, conception and communication skills.
- Used to create a game editor and the prototype of a photography game
- Still in progress!

projects.title: SproutEngine
projects.bodyText:
- Development of an OpenGL rendering engine
- Model loading, Shadowmapping, postprocessing, PBR rendering
- Adaptation of a terrain generation project for the engine 
- Basic Physics Engine
- Ongoing development

projects.title: Raytracer
projects.bodyText:
- Development of a raytracer integrated to my engine
- Handles both CPU and GPU rendering
- The raster part of the engine allows for easy scene setup and dynamic view 
- Monte-Carlo path tracing, with multiple sampling strategies 
- TLAS and BLAS generation and display

projects.title: Terrain generation and erosion
projects.bodyText:
- Development of a terrain generation tools used by the other students to complete their part of the assignment.
- Implementation of a water erosion algorithm on a single CPU core.

projects.title: Audio-reactive boids
projects.bodyText:
- GPU-based boids algorithm. 
- Reaction to collisions. 
- Integrated an audio spectrum alalyzing plugin to change the behaviour of the boids depending on the sound played on an audio output.

projects.title: Utimate Star Destroyer vs The World
projects.bodyText:
- Video game developed in a few hours.
- Shoot'em up inspired by the classics of the gender.
 - Shaders, upgradable weapon system, 3C, audio integration

projects.title: Voxel-based terrain generation
projects.bodyText:
- Voxelisation of an implicit-based terrain. 
 - Quadtree and adaptative voxelization, on a single CPU core.
 - fusion operators, procedural noise, notion of "potential" for the voxels.
- Project including a bit of work on a few geometry concepts: generation of triangle mesh, mesh I/O, mesh simplification, parametric curves.

projects.title: Ocean simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Wave generation using a sum of sine and FbM
- Realtime GPU simulation

projects.title: Soup
projects.bodyText:
- Creation of a game in a team of 5 students
- Creation of the original concept
- Work on the game's graphics (shaders, rendering pipeline modifications)
- Gameplay functionalities development and assets integration

projects.title: 3D scenes rendering
projects.bodyText:
- 3D scenes rendering using rasterization and raytracing during my ID3D master's degree, using the engine Gkit2light.
- GlTF file reading
- GPU instanciation
- Compute shaders
- Shadow mapping
- Monte Carlo path tracing

projects.title: Terrain generator
projects.bodyText:
- Generation of virtual worlds through procedural noise 
- Terrain data export: slope, wetness, laplacian...
- Tectonic erosion (https://inria.hal.science/hal-01262376/document)
- Procedural placement of villages through a maximisation of a score
- Generation of roads between the villages

projects.title: Coastal erosion simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Generation of procedural terrains in Unity
- Island generation
- Simulation of the growth of corals thanks to a DLA algorithm
- Simulation of the sand deposit on a coastline through water movements

projects.title: Floward - Scientific Game Jam 2021
projects.bodyText:
Development of a video game on a scientific subject during a weekend
- Participation to the game design
- Development of gameplay elements and assets integration

projects.title: Gravitation simulation
projects.bodyText:
- Simulation of the gravitation phenomenon by implementing Newton's law
- Procedural generation of asteroids using a subdivided icosphere and procedural noise 
- Creation of an UI to allow the creation of cusomizable planets, visualize their movements and simulate their trajectories
